actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the U.S. Housing Act of 1937 to increase the amount of the annual contributions which may be paid thereunder with respect to low-rent housing projects by establishing a more realistic subsidy formula.

summary.text: Increases the amount of the annual contributions which may be paid under the United States Housing Act with respect to low-rent housing projects by revising the subsidy formula. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 1410(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend the U.S. Housing Act of 1937 to increase the amount of the annual contributions which may be paid thereunder with respect to low-rent housing projects by establishing a more realistic subsidy formula.
